partners_meta_description: InterTransService serves leading Kazakhstani and international companies across various industries.
partners_intro_description: We serve leading companies in Kazakhstan across oil & gas, construction, and industrial sectors. Our clients trust us to supply quality equipment for their major projects thanks to our experience and reliability.
partners_category1_description: Equipment supply for oil extraction and refining operations
partners_category2_description: Heavy construction machinery for large-scale projects
partners_category3_description: Equipment for mining and manufacturing enterprises
partners_cta_description: Interested in our services? We're ready to provide comprehensive solutions for your projects.
